mapper.insert: insert into bug(name, degree, type, threat_type, vendor, source, cve, cnnvd, description, notice, website, entity, created_time, updated_time) values(#{name}, #{degree}, #{type}, #{threatType}, #{vendor}, #{source}, #{cve}, #{cnnvd}, #{description}, #{notice}, #{website}, #{entity}, #{createdTime}, #{updatedTime})
